error_message: Unable to connect to the database. Please check your connection settings and credentials.
solution: Verify the database connection settings, including the hostname, port, username, and password. Ensure that the database server is reachable and operational.

error_message: Failed to extract data from source. Ensure source is available and accessible.
solution: Check the availability of the data source. Ensure that the source system is up and running and that you have the necessary permissions to access the data.

error_message: Data extraction failed due to insufficient permissions on the source system.
solution: Ensure that the credentials used for data extraction have the necessary permissions to access and extract the data. Update permissions if required.

error_message: Transformation script encountered a syntax error. Review the transformation logic.
solution: Review the transformation script for syntax errors. Make sure that all expressions and statements are correctly written and valid.

error_message: Data transformation failed due to mismatched schema between source and target.
solution: Verify that the schema of the source data matches the schema expected by the transformation logic. Adjust the schema as needed.

error_message: Data transformation timed out. Optimize the transformation logic or increase resources.
solution: Optimize the transformation logic to improve performance. If the transformation requires more resources, consider increasing allocated resources.

error_message: Failed to load data into the target system. Verify target system status and permissions.
solution: Check the status of the target system and ensure that it is operational. Verify that you have the necessary permissions to load data into the target system.

error_message: Data loading process was aborted due to data format inconsistencies.
solution: Check for inconsistencies in the data format between the source and the target. Ensure that data is correctly formatted and meets the target systemâ€™s requirements.

error_message: Loading data into the database failed due to constraints violations.
solution: Review database constraints and ensure that the data being loaded complies with these constraints. Modify the data or constraints as needed.

error_message: Failed to send notification due to network issues
solution: Check the configuration of the notification service and ensure it is correctly set up. Verify network connectivity and service availability.

error_message: Notification sending was aborted due to an invalid recipient address or format.
solution: Verify that the recipient email addresses are correctly formatted and valid. Correct any invalid addresses and retry sending the notification.

error_message: Unable to connect to the notification service. Check service status and API keys.
solution: Ensure that the notification service is up and running. Verify that API keys and credentials are correctly configured and valid.

error_message: Report generation failed due to missing or corrupt input data.
solution: Check the input data for completeness and integrity. Ensure that all required data is available and not corrupted.

error_message: Report generation was aborted due to insufficient memory or system resources.
solution: Increase the available system resources or memory. Optimize the report generation process to reduce resource consumption.

error_message: Report generation failed due to data format error
solution: Verify that the data format is supported by the report generation tool. Correct any data format errors and ensure compatibility.

error_message: Task failed due to an unexpected error. Check logs for detailed error information.
solution: Review the task logs for detailed error information. Investigate the logs to identify the root cause of the unexpected error.

error_message: Execution of the task was interrupted. Ensure that resources are properly allocated and retry.
solution: Verify that sufficient resources are allocated for the task. Ensure that the task environment is stable and retry execution.

error_message: Authentication failed. Ensure correct credentials and access rights.
solution: Check the credentials used for authentication and ensure they are correct. Verify that the account has the necessary access rights.

error_message: Authorization error. Verify user permissions for the requested operation.
solution: Review the user permissions and ensure they are sufficient for the requested operation. Update permissions as necessary.

error_message: Task failed due to resource constraints. Increase the allocated resources or optimize the task.
solution: Increase the resources allocated to the task. Alternatively, optimize the task to use fewer resources.

error_message: Execution halted because of exceeding resource limits. Consider scaling up your resources.
solution: Review the resource limits and scale up resources if necessary. Ensure that resource allocation meets the requirements of the task.
